my favorite movie is pretty woman.

I love my green tea set

participant_2.background:

i wonder about what life in space would be like.

content.text: It's so cool to meet a fellow traveler! Where are you from?
I'm from the desert. How about you?
I grew up in the country, where there was plenty of land to grow sunflowers.
That sounds so peaceful and lovely. I've always been interested in outer space. Do you ever wonder about what life would be like there?
I do! I think it would be amazing to experience zero gravity. I'm also curious about what kind of life forms are out there.
That's really cool! I'm not sure if I would be brave enough to go into space. I'm more of a homebody, I guess.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to cook, especially steak. I've been told my steaks are to die for!
That sounds delicious! I love to cook too. I especially love making beautiful things with my hands, like painting or pottery.
Oh, that's really cool! I've always wanted to try pottery.
